knimeNode.name: UCSC Gene Context
knimeNode.shortDescription: View Gene Context using UCSC known Genes

fullDescription.intro:
Displays the gene Context using UCSC known Genes.
References
Knime4Bio. Author: Pierre Lindenbaum PhD, INSERM UMR 915, Institut du thorax, Nantes. Reference: manuscript in preparation. Please, report any problem here.
fullDescription.option: JDBC uri. For the ucsc data it is: jdbc:mysql://genome-mysql.cse.ucsc.edu/hg19
JDBC user. For the ucsc data it is: "genome"
JDBC password. For the ucsc data it is empty
The VCF POS column. The genomic position (1-based)
